IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: THIS INCIDENT WAS AUDIBLY AND VISUALLY RECORDED ON AXON BODY WORN AND VEHICLE CAMERAS Defendant: Edward Joseph Dietz Jr. Date of Birth: 01/28/1976 Date of Arrest: 04/26/2023 Time of Arrest: 2234 hours MD License #: MD10272233662 Westminster DUI #: 23-063 TRAINING/CERTIFICATES Trained in administering Standardized Field Sobriety Tests through the Maryland State Police and National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, July 2019. Trained to investigate collisions through the Maryland State Police, July 2019. Trained in Advanced Roadside Impaired Driving Enforcement through the Baltimore County Police Department, February 2021 Graduate of the University of Maryland DUI Institute, August 2021. Drug Recognition Expert, December 2022. VEHICLE IN MOTION (PHASE 1) On April 26, 2023, at approximately 2200 hours, I, Trooper First Class Mills #6784, currently assigned to the Maryland State Police Westminster Barrack, responded to eastbound Maryland Route 140 at Richardson Road for a two-vehicle collision while operating marked Maryland State Police vehicle G-9. PERSONAL CONTACT (PHASE 2) Upon my arrival at the scene, I observed Fireboard and Emergency Medical Service (EMS) units were on scene and had both directions of Maryland 140 shut down to secure the scene since vehicles and debris were still in the roadway. Due to the lane closure, I positioned my patrol vehicle directly behind a Honda CRV that was parked on the right shoulder of eastbound Maryland Route 140 at Richardson Road. I made contact with the female driver of the Honda, who was identified by her Maryland drivers license as Kelly Lynn Brady (DOB 06/10/2000 W/F). Brady stated that she witnessed the collision occur. Brady stated that she was driving and saw a white vehicle (which she positively identified to be the crashed vehicle approximately one hundred (100) feet in front of her location) pass her vehicle and another vehicle on the right shoulder and strike the guardrail. Brady added that the white vehicle then struck another vehicle traveling eastbound on Maryland Route 140 after striking the guardrail. Brady stated that she observed the Hyundai travel at a high rate of speed around her on the shoulder. After the crash occurred, Brady checked on the welfare of all involved drivers. Brady stated that when she made contact with the driver of the white vehicle, he stated, I cant see straight. Deputy First Class Remmes #0677 of the Carroll County Sheriffs Office requested that she complete a written statement, which she voluntarily completed (See attached written statement.) EMS personnel made contact with the sole male occupant of the vehicle, and he refused any medical treatment. I made contact with a deputy from the Carroll County Sheriffs Office who was on scene prior to my arrival. The deputy handed me a Maryland Drivers license and vehicle insurance card for the driver and the Hyundai. The deputy further explained the driver of the Hyundai was argumentative and had not given him the vehicle registration despite his efforts in asking for the registration card several times. The deputy advised the driver of the Hyundai claimed that he gave him the registration card. I asked the deputy where the driver said he was coming from, and the deputy advised the driver stated he was coming from the Reisterstown, Glen Burnie area and going toward Westminster. The deputy also advised he could detect the odor of an alcoholic beverage while interacting with the driver. The deputy also advised had asked the driver to exit the vehicle, and the driver refused. I advised the deputy I was going to give the vehicle and driver information to the barrack, and the deputy advised he would stay with the driver. I then made contact with the driver of the Ford Bronco and asked for her drivers license, vehicle registration, and insurance information. The driver was identified by her Maryland drivers license as Stacy Marie Little (DOB 09/05/1973 W/F). Little advised that she saw the Hyundai traveling on the right shoulder, adjacent to her vehicle and shortly after, the Hyundai struck the guardrail. Little added that as a result of the Hyundai colliding with the guardrail, the vehicle spun into her path of travel and struck her Ford Bronco on the passenger side. Due to the airbags deploying in the Ford as result of the impact, Little could not make any further observations. After a closer examination of the Hyundai, I noted that a combination of airbags had deployed inside the vehicle. I also noted that the keys were still in the vehicle. After investigating the collision, I determined that the driver of the white Hyundai made an unsafe lane change on the shoulder, passed two vehicles while offroad, failed to control the Hyundai, struck the guardrail end, and struck the passenger side of the Ford Bronco as a result of the impact of the collision. The driver was identified by his Maryland drivers license as Edward Joseph Dietz Jr. (01/28/1976 W/M.) While speaking with Dietz Jr., I observed glassy and bloodshot eyes. Dietz Jr. was seated in the drivers seat of the Hyundai, smoking a freshly lit cigar. Dietz Jr. stated, I didnt hit nobody, they hit me. Look at me in the road, Im in the road. I didnt hit nobody, they hit me. Im in the road. Nonononono, I didnt hit nobody. I explained to Dietz Jr. I did not say that he did, and he stated, Im in the road I didnt hit nobody, they hit me. Nononononah, they hit me. I explained to Dietz Jr. that I had asthma and did not want to cough on him, and asked that he extinguish his cigarette. Dietz Jr. complied with my request. I asked Dietz Jr. if the EMS personnel had evaluated him yet, to make sure he was okay, and Dietz Jr. did not respond. Dietz Jr. looked straight ahead and did not speak. As I continued to attempt to speak with Dietz Jr., he stated, I didnt hit nobody, they hit me. I continued to explain to Dietz Jr. I wanted to make sure he was okay and have EMS evaluate him to ensure he was not seriously injured, and he stated, I cant move cause he hit me. I advised Dietz Jr. that he might have internal injuries, and I wanted EMS to, at a minimum, evaluate him on scene, and he stated, If I was internally hurt, I wouldnt be able to move. They hit me, I am not able to move. I got airbags, airbags, I didnt hit nobody. In the intersection, I didnt fucking hit nobody. As I was advising TFC Parrell of the information I had gathered, Dietz Jr. lifted the driver-side curtain airbag that had deployed and stated, Answer me, answer me the question, you ask me a question, Ill answer you. I attempted to speak with Dietz Jr. again, and he stated, I didnt hit nobody. I asked Dietz Jr. where he was coming from and where he was going, to which he did not respond. I asked Dietz Jr. if he needed me to repeat the questions. I asked Dietz Jr. where he was coming from if he was coming from Westminster or headed to Westminster, and Dietz Jr. stated, Im in Westminster, where was I coming from? I confirmed with Dietz Jr. that I asked where he was coming from, and he stated, Westminster. Its fucked up cause they driving erratically. Nah, he was driving erratically, and I was driving fifty-five (55) miles an hour. I asked Dietz Jr. what kind of vehicle it was that he was describing as driving erratically, Dietz Jr. hesitated, stating, That was a Impala, nineteen ninety-eight (1998). I confirmed with Dietz Jr. the year he stated, and he further stated, Got it. And he driving two (2) lanes, stopped somebody, and you fucking with me, (Dietz Jr. became visibly agitated and began shouting) and you fucking with me, you have two (2) stops away, you know it, you know it! I advised Dietz Jr. I did not know the information he just gave me until he mentioned it, and he stated, Oh, you aint know it, theres two (2), there two (2) cop, theres two (2) stops away. Theres a cop and his car, a cop driving, and hes dirty. Oh, you dont know that, oh you know that, theres a cop right there. Oh, you didnt know that. I advised Dietz Jr. I did not know the information until he told me, and he stated, Oh, you aint know that. But I didnt hit nobody, he hit me. But Im in the right lane, Im in the right lane (Dietz Jr. pointed, with his left hand, out of the drivers side window to the eastbound travel lane), and nobody hit me, I hit them, they hit me. I attempted to confirm with Dietz Jr. that he was coming from Westminster, and he stated, No, no, no, no, no, Im in the right lane, and they hit me. I confirmed with Dietz Jr. he was in the right lane, and he stated, Where am I at? I advised Dietz Jr. he was in Westminster, and he stated, And Im in the lef, right lane, Im in the right lane. So, you, you, you, fucking with me, and he wrapped two (2) cars ahead of you, that fucked up. Youre fucking wit me. I attempted to speak with Dietz Jr. further; however, he interrupted me, stating, Nah, I not answering any questions no more, you fucking go at me. I advised Dietz Jr. I detected the odor of an alcoholic beverage and asked how many alcoholic beverages he consumed, and Dietz Jr. did not respond. I asked Dietz Jr. to tell the truth, and he did not respond. I requested Dietz Jr. step out of his vehicle, to which he complied. Prior to exiting the vehicle, Dietz Jr. relit the cigarette he previously had. Once outside the vehicle, Dietz Jr. was asked to extinguish the cigarette but refused. TFC Perrell then assisted Dietz Jr. extinguish the cigarette. A check through the Maryland Department of Motor Vehicles revealed that Dietz Jr.s license was valid. He did not have any open warrants. As I continued to communicate with Dietz Jr. outside of the vehicle, I continued to detect the strong odor of an alcoholic beverage emanating from his breath and person. PRE-ARREST SCREENING (PHASE 3) Due to Dietz Jr.s aggressive and argumentative behavior, Standardized Field Sobriety Testing was not administered. PRELIMINARY BREATH TEST Due to Dietz Jr.s aggressive and argumentative behavior, the Preliminary Breath Test was not offered. ARREST Based on the totality of circumstances, I concluded that Dietz Jr. was driving a motor vehicle under the influence of alcohol: At fault in a two motor vehicle collision (vehicle passed two vehicles on the shoulder, struck guardrail end, and struck another vehicle as a result of striking the guardrail) Dietz Jr.s own statements Dietz Jr.s argumentative and aggressive behavior Refusing to exit the vehicle so that he could be evaluated by EMS personnel A strong odor of an alcoholic beverage emanating from Dietz Jr.s breath and person. Unable to operate a vehicle safely At approximately 2234 hours, I placed Dietz Jr. under arrest for driving while under the influence of alcohol. TFC Perrell notified the barrack Dietz Jr. was placed under arrest. I informed Dietz Jr. he was placed under arrest for driving under the influence of alcohol. I explained to Dietz Jr. that because of his argumentative demeanor and my observations of him stumbling while exiting his vehicle, standardized field sobriety was not conducted. I asked Dietz Jr. if he had a cell phone he wanted to bring with him because he would have the opportunity to make a phone call later, and he stated, In the car. I advised Dietz Jr. I needed his cooperation for the rest of the process, and he stated, Yes, sir. I continued to explain to Dietz Jr. that he would need to cooperate with me throughout the rest of the process, and he stated, Im sorry, sir. Prior to walking Dietz Jr. back to my patrol vehicle, Dietz Jr. stated, Officer, officer, Im, Im, Im para, Im paranoid, and Im about to flip out., can you take me, and just, whatever you gotta do. I asked Dietz Jr. if he would feel comfortable in my patrol vehicle, and he stated, Yes, sir. While walking Dietz Jr. to my patrol vehicle, he stated, They hit me, sir, I didnt do anything, you see that, you see the accident, I didnt hit nobody. It hurt me, I didnt hit nobody. Officer, I never would hurt somebody, thats my job. They hit me. Im being honest. It was nothin I did, he hit me cause they was trying to go fast. I did nothing, motherfuckers hit me. Once at the front of my patrol vehicle, I explained to Dietz Jr. he was going to be searched, and he stated, I didnt hit nobody, they hit me. I have no guns, I have nothing. Camera, Im telling the truth. I explained to Dietz the front camera in my patrol vehicle was activated, following departmental policy, and he stated, You can do it all you want, Im telling the motherfuckers hit me, I aint going nowhere, I was just going around a loop. Dietz Jr. was searched his person for weapons and contraband, both with negative results. While conducting the search incident to arrest of Dietz Jr., I removed his baseball hat, and he stated, Keep my hat on, Im cold. I assured Dietz Jr. he would have his hat back, and I continued the search. Dietz Jr. stated, I dont give a fuck if its New York, Im cold. I informed Dietz Jr. it would not be long, and he stated, No. Put my hat on Im cold. I didnt do shit, man, I didnt do nothing. I asked Dietz Jr. if he remembered what was explained to him when he exited his vehicle, and he continued to have an aggressive and argumentative demeanor, stating, I got out the car, I don, fuck that, fuck that. I informed Dietz Jr. he would be taken to jail, and he stated, I dont care neither motherfucker. Fuck you. TFC Perrell instructed Dietz Jr. to look away from me, and Dietz Jr. stated, Ill look away from him, fucking hurt me. That dont hurt me bitch, that dont hurt me. I aint do nothing, I didnt do nothing. I asked Dietz Jr. to start over in an effort to de-escalate his behavior, and he stated, You can start over all you want, I aint do nothing. I aint got nothin on me. Take my handcuffs off, take the handcuffs off me. I explained to Dietz Jr. I was not going to remove the handcuffs, and he stated, You with God right bitch, I aint got nothing on me, take my pants down if you want. I informed Dietz Jr. I would not be doing that, and he stated, Work, cause I dont like my ass out. This motherfucker, come on, man. There were two (2) dollar bills in Dietz Jr.s pants pocket, I began counting the money in front of Dietz Jr., and he stated, Two (2) dollars, two (2) dollars. Where am I going, nowhere. You holding me, theres no reason for you holding me. You got the camera on record, alright, then keep it rolling. I didnt hit nobody, Im in my fucking lane. I asked Dietz Jr. to take a step back, off the front bumper of my patrol vehicle, and he stated, There you go. Im a fucking thug, right? No reason to fucking search me, you dont even have a protocol to search me. I explained to Dietz Jr. that because he was under arrest, he was being searched, and he stated, Im under arrest, no reason to search me, cause I never hit nobody, they hit me. Its called a search, and its wrong. Imma let you know that right off my bat. Are your cameras recording? I assured Dietz Jr. the cameras were recording, and he stated, I hate nobody. Nononono, Imma search you, Im gonna search you. Officer, I didnt do nothing. I didnt do nothing. I didnt hit nobody, hit me. While conducting the search incident to arrest, I observed the groin area of Dietz Jr.s pants to be wet to the touch from urine. TRANSPORT TO BARRACK Dietz Jr. was escorted to the passenger side of my patrol vehicle, and he stated, Imma go in, you dont got to push me. It was explained to Dietz Jr. he was not being pushed. Once seated in the front passenger seat of my patrol vehicle, Dietz Jr. stated, Yes, sir. Can you loosen this up a little bit? This hurts me. While attempting to instruct Dietz Jr. on how to sit in the front seat of my patrol vehicle, he stated, Dude, Im not hurtin nobody, I aint do nothing. Officer, officer, can I see your name, please? I informed Dietz Jr. my name was Mills, and he stated, Mills, I aint hurt nobody Mills. I instructed Dietz Jr. to sit forward in the seat in an effort to have him seated comfortably, and he stated, Dude, Im in my lane. Even in my lane I was in my lane. I instructed Dietz Jr. to scoot forward in the seat again, and he stated, Officer, can you please I would never hurt nobody officer. I instructed Dietz Jr. on how to sit in the seat, and he stated, I cant, officer, it hurts, officer I wouldnt hurt nobody. I put the seatbelt on Dietz Jr., and he stated, Officer, that hurts. I explained I wanted him to be safe, and Dietz Jr. stated, Officer, Officer, a little link in this handcuffs. I explained I could not adjust the handcuffs, and Dietz Jr. stated, Officer, I cant even move. Imma asking you, officer, one link. I explained I could not adjust the handcuffs, and he stated, Dude, I not going nowhere, not going nowhere. Put it in front of me. I stepped to the front of my patrol vehicle to retrieve Dietz Jr.s personal belongings, and he began to state, Officer, can I take a picture? Can I take a picture because this is wrong? I informed Dietz Jr. what of his personal belongings I had and where I was putting them, Dietz Jr. stated, Can you, can you loosen these up, please? I explained I could not adjust the handcuffs again. Dietz Jr. then stated, Well look, look, I didnt create no accident they hit me. I was in my lane. So obviously, you are incarcerating me for no reason. I was in my lane. I explained to Dietz Jr. he would have an opportunity in court to make that argument, and he stated, Court for is the reality. As I began to transport Dietz Jr. to the Maryland State Police Westminster Barrack for processing, he stated, I aint gon let this go, Im a tell you this shit right now, I hit nobody, they hit me. They dont know how to drive. Im a professional driver I drive forty-five (45) miles an hour in a fifty-five (55). I dont give a fuck how fast they drive! And I never hit nobody, you have any camera, you have any proof to prove me wrong, no, I hit nobody. If they wanna go fast in a forty-five (45), thats their problem. I hit aint nobody, tell me I hit somebody. they hit me. Im in my right lane. I see my car. Can I take a picture of my car? Stop for a second, officer! Take a picture of my car. I attempted to explain pictures of the vehicles would be taken, but Dietz Jr. shouted over me, stating, No nnnnnoooo, stop for a second officer, take a picture of my car. I explained to Dietz Jr. he was not in charge of the situation, and he stated, Im not gonna be charged cuz I aint hit nobody, they hit me. I was in behind they hit me. Officer, can I get a picture of this accident, please? Just, I dont have any money, officer. Im fucking fucked up, my wife wants to leave me I dont have any more money, officer. If you think I did anything wrong, I didnt do anything wrong (Dietz Jr. began crying). I explained to Dietz Jr. that he just made a statement about being wrong, and he stated, That doesnt matter I didnt hit nobody they hit me. If theyre driving sixty-five (65) miles an hour in a fucking fifty-five (55), it doesnt matta. I explained to Dietz Jr., as I had done before, that we are both humans trying to get through the situation, and he stated, What are you gonna, youll, youll figure it out, a person driving 65 on a fifty-five (55), youre gonna, theyre gonna to hurt you. I have no reason to drive fast. Im going home. I live twenty (20) miles away, theres no reason for me to drive fast. I asked Dietz Jr. if we could talk like men, and he stated, Do you want to talk like men? A man is this, I hit nobody. Thats my man. How are you gonna hit me and tell me Im wrong? Cause Im driving forty-five (45). And they think its okay, thats not right. I was driving forty-five (45) miles an hour. And you want to hit me cause you think Im not driving fast. I dont drive fast, Im going home. Why you drive fast when you go home, no reason. I explained there was a cause of what happened and that I was just trying to understand what that cause was, and Dietz Jr. stated, You tell me the underlying cause, officer, obviously, the person hit me because I was driving forty-five (45) miles an hour. Officer, I dont drive faster than that. Im going home. Why the fuck would I drive faster than fifty-five (55) on fifty-five (55) when Im going home, twenty (20) miles. Makes no sense they want to get by me, they want to hit me, I didnt hit nobody. You can see my car, And you going to see the, the scription on it when it prints out. I hit nobody, they hit me. I dont deal with traffic like that, they want to race around it, they race around it, thats not who I am. Just not, I aint trying to hurt nobody, I dont hurt nobody, its not who I am, I just drive. Fuckers wanna hit me to hit me, you gon see it, you gon see impact on the ticket. You gon see the impact, I hit nobody. Remember what Im saying to you cause you gon see the impact, cause I hit nobody. And I want that documentioned, documentioned, docker, what the fuck am I, dockermentioned, cause I hit nobody. Forty-five (45) in a fifty-five (55) is not illegal ten (10) miles below the spear limit means that, no, look, I dont drive fast, I cant see, thats all it means. I fucking drivin safe in a fuckin dark zone, thats fucked up. Guardless of what the fuck had happened, I didnt drive fast, and I dont drive fast because I dont like to drive fast, its not my character. They wanna hit me, so Im fucking to blame. You wanna, you better check their stats on that camera, on that car that hit me in the back, I swear to God, Imma keep promotin this, I never did nothing I was driving straight, and he hit me in the back. Never drive fast. Nowhere to go, Im going home. Fucked up, man. Im sitting in handcuffs, I did something, and the mother fucker hit me. And you know he hit me, you know he hit me, right? Tell me! (Dietz Jr. shouted) Officer, did he hit me or not? you have to answer this question, did he hit me or not? I attempted to explain to Dietz Jr. the answer to his question, but he began talking over me, stating, Officer, did he hit me or not? I explained to Dietz Jr. that I was not going to answer his question because he continued to talk over me, and he shouted, You have to answer! It doesnt matter, the law says you have to answer. Did he hit me or not? He hit me. I didnt hit him, he hit me. I attempted to explain to Dietz Jr. that if he stopped yelling, I would talk to him, but he again interrupted me and stated, Im not yelling at you, officer, Im being direct. Officer, I would never yell at you I respect your position, I respect what you do. Officer, Ive been trained in the military, I went to war, just not, its not labeled. I went to war. I asked Dietz Jr. how many years he was in the military, and he stated, Two years, officer, I killed many people, Im not legit, they dont label me, I do what I do. I expressed my appreciation for his service to Dietz Jr. and explained we are on the same team, Dietz Jr. then stated, I dont have a team, Im a soldier, theres no team. Somebody hits me you need to respect that, I aint hit nobody. I asked Dietz Jr. what branch of the military he was in, and he stated, One ninty-two (192). I explained I did not have military experience and asked what branch of the military he meant, and Dietz Jr. stated, Air Force. I asked Dietz Jr. what his MOU was, and he mumbled incoherently and then stated, Sir, I train people to kill, you know that, sir? I aint never hit nobody, he hit me in the back. I train people to kill, sir. I again asked Dietz Jr. what his MOU was, and he stated, MOU is not labeled, Im a trainer, I train soldiers to kill. Its not labeled, sir. Youre gonna get a call, youre gonna get a call from the FBI, youll get a call. Im not labeled. I asked who I should expect a call from, and he stated, Mr. McGuire. I asked if that was his supervisor, and he stated, No. Hes the police comm., police commissioner of New York State. I did nothing, I had nobody. I got hit, and Im being charged for no reason. You telling me what Im charged for? I explained I told him what he was arrested for when I put the handcuffs on him, and he stated, Nononono, no, what did you tell me I was charged for? I explained he was arrested for driving under the influence of alcohol. Dietz Jr. then stated, DUI? I hit nobody. I explained to Dietz Jr. he was still placed under arrest for driving under the influence of alcohol, and he stated, It dont matter, but I hit nobody. Tell me what Im charged for, tell me all the charges. I asked Dietz Jr. about the Bronco and the guardrail he hit, and he stated, I dont have a Bronco, I have a fucking hyndai elantra. I again asked about the Bronco that he hit, and Dietz Jr. stated, I hit no, bronco, he hit me cause I was doing forty-five (45) miles an hour, in the back. Look at my, look at my car, he hit me in the back. Look at it, on the right side, on the rear bumper, on the right side. Fuck his Bronco. I hit nobody I drive forty-five (45) miles an hour going home. its wrong. do you want to drive sixty-five (65), seventy (70) miles an hour, he was wrong, check his, check his car, you have the stats in his car. Thats easy. so easy. he was driving seventy (70) miles an hour, officer, on a fifty-five (55), and clip me, and wanna blame me for this shit. Thats wrong, its OK though, officer, I got, I got, I got people. Im pissed off, though, I didnt hit nobody, Im driving straight, and I am, you saw my car though Im in my lane, Im in my lane. Im in my fucking lane, and these mother, this fuc, fuckers hit me in the right side. Its a merge area, and he hits me in the right side. Im doing forty-five (45) miles an hour, he cant accept Im doing forty-five (45). Fuck him. You gon see his, you gon see it, because his car has an impact camera, it has impact camera, it tells the speed, it gone tell you I was driving forty-five (45). I did everything I was supposed to, my wife trains, you officers. I did everything I was supposed to do, officer. My wife trains you guys every day, trains are you CIT officers? I did nothing wrong. I just want you, I just want you give me the benefit of the doubt. I dont care if Im going to jail, I did nothing wrong, officer. I explained I was trying to help him and that I did not want him to go to jail, Dietz Jr. then stated, Honestly, though, officer, Im suicidal, I dont give a fuck about this life. But I would never hurt nobody, thats who I am. Im willing to die for somebody else, But I would never hurt somebody, never! They hit me. Thats the honest truth I would never hurt somebody. Ive safe so many people, put my life on the line, you dont even know, bro. Think that this is a job, Ive been shot at, they try to stab me, they try to kill me, and yet I still protected them mother fuckers that didnt have nothing. But yet Im a white mother fucker, they dont care about me. Du, where you going, dog the fucking barracks is right here on one forty (140), where you going? I want all my stats on all the car, Ima tell you that right now. I did nothing wrong. Somebody hit me from the back automatically, its that person that hit me in the backs fault, you hear me? You got the camera running? Officer, do you have a camera running? I explained that is what the red light was, and Dietz Jr. stated, Aint no red light on, on that officer. I pointed out the red light, and Dietz Jr. stated, Thats on the top. Thats a speed camera, thats not a red light on a camera. I explained it was a camera, and he stated, Dont tell me the truth, dont tell me a lie. Youre lying to me. I explained to Dietz Jr. that if he looked to the right, he would see a camera, Dietz Jr. stated, I look to my right, I see a fucking car on the right. I explained to Dietz Jr. to look up, not out the window, and he stated, You still arresting me for doing nothing wrong, officer are you still arresting me for doing nothing wrong officer, I hit nobody. You illegally arrested me, bro, you know that, right? I explained to Dietz Jr. that is what court is for, and he stated, Nonononono, no, thats not for court. You illegally arrested me for no reason. Put me in handcuffs for no reason. I got me in this car talking to you shit, so you can get me say something that I aint do. For somebody hit me, Im driving forty-five (45) miles an hour. When you see the camera, and you see their footage, and you see the speed limit they were going, then you understand I do a fucking thing. Yeah, Im pissed off, I dont give a fuck you got me in handcuffs for no reason, you shoulda took the motherfucker in front of me. Take the motherfucker that was in front of me, that was there, who hit me. Take em! You wont take him right, he hit me, but you wont take him. Once at the Maryland State Police Westminster Barrack, I escorted Dietz Jr. inside the building. As I escorted him into the barracks, he stated, You see the reports, I didnt hit nobody. Im in the back they hit me. As the door was opened for Dietz Jr. to walk through, stopped and stated, I know the law hold up, officer officer whats your name, Officer Mills? Did you get the camera footage? Officer Mills. Officer Mills, did you get the camera footage? Dietz Jr. was taken to the DUI procession room, and a secondary search of his person was conducted by Sgt. Smith #2927, per Maryland State Police Policy and Procedures. While Sgt. Smith was explaining the procedures to Dietz Jr., Dietz Jr. became argumentative and stated, Ive been doing this since I was fucking fourteen (14), Ive been shot at, they stab me. You wanna see my stab wounds? They hit me in the back, I did nothing. Sgt. Smith explained that it did not matter because he was arrested for driving under the influence, and Dietz Jr. stated, It dont matter. No, it dont, no, it dont. I break no law by drinking. I didnt hit nobody they hit me in the back. Sgt. Smith explained he was not going to argue with him, and Dietz Jr. stated, You can argue all you want. Ima tell you the truth. Sgt. Smith explained he appreciated being told the truth. Dietz Jr. then stated, They hit me in the back, you gonna pull up the footage? Sgt Smith further explained that once the processing was completed, he would be released from the Barrack, and Dietz Jr. stated, No, Im not gonna get out of here because they hit me in the back. I want, I want, I want a lawsuit because he hit me in the back. Sgt Smith explained if he wanted a lawsuit, that was fine, and Dietz Jr. stated, I want a lawsuit. He hit me in the back Sgt. Smith continued to attempt to explain the process, and Dietz Jr. stated, Im not going to refuse, but what Im saying is he hit me in the back, officer. I had no, I hit nobody in the front. My car is not merged in the front. He hit me in the back. Officer, I just want this, no disrespect to you or your fellow officer, what I want, can you put this on paper? I hit nobody he hit me in the back, on the right side, and youll see where he sideswiped me, thats it. I didnt drive fast, I was driving forty-five (45). Sgt. Smith attempted to explain further, and Dietz Jr. stated, Honestly, officer, how many times youve been drinking and been intoxicated, dont fuck with me. Both of all been drunk and driving. Sgt. Smith attempted to talk to Dietz Jr., and he stated, I dont care, I didnt drive drunk he hit me in the back. Sgt. Smith explained he was not concerned about the collision, and Dietz Jr. stated, The accident, he hit me in the back because he was driving fast. And you can see, you gonna pull it up? Sgt. Smith again explained he was not concerned about the collision, that he was concerned about the DUI process, Dietz Jr. stated, Ill sit down, Im sorry, sir. Im sorry, sir. Sgt. I want a lawyer before I sign anything so I can pre-approve anything and proofread it. I want a lawyer stating that. Do you understand me? Its not that I refuse to sign anything, I want a lawyer before I sign anything. I dont believe you, I dont trust cops. Ive been hurt plenty of times before cops I was a poor man growing up in Harlem, cops didnt like me because I was hanging out with black people. Fuck you. Fuck the cops. Thats why I didnt want to be a cop, Mr. Smith. My dream was to be a cop, you know that, but you beat me up, you stole my dream, Mr. Smith, Mr. Mills, because you dont know how to act, you stole my dreams because you abuse people, you abuse your power. Im not lying, Im telling you the truth, I want to be a cop. I wouldve been a good cop. And I love people. I have no respect for yall. You need to get a better job, man, what the fuck yall dont even make thirty-eight thousand (38,000) a year, sheriffs department and troopers only making forty-five (45) what the fuck you doing. I make ninety (90,000) a year driving a truck. No job, not even hard. What the fuck are yall doing? Driving a fucking cop car. Yeah, your overtime is still under a hundred (100). Ill make one-fifty (150). Stupid shit. Easy job, though. I aint gonna lie easy job. You in the wrong business, Mr. Smith, Mr. Mills I see your, I see your self-righteousness. Youre a Mormon, Im watching you, youre Mormon. Youre in the wrong business bro. Your love for God aint gon do you right here. Sgt Smith instructed Dietz Jr. to stand up, and we were going to walk him down the hall, back out to my patrol vehicle, Dietz Jr. stated, Youre going to move me because Im not gonna move with these cuffs on. It hurt, it hurt. Sgt. Smith advised he would walk alongside him to ensure he did not fall. Once in my patrol vehicle, Dietz Jr. stated, Youre doing it on purpose, fucking bastard. I love you. Fuck you, Mr. Smith. Fuck you. Fuck you, Mr. Smith. Youre doing it on purpose. Fuck you, Mr. Smith. I love you. Do it on purpose fucking bastard. I explained to him I was putting the paperwork in his wallet, so it would not get lost, and he stated, It is, Im being violated, my rights are being violated. Whos in the back? Sgt Smith explained it was him and that I would be driving; Dietz Jr. stated, Im gonna tell you like I told the other officer, my rights are being violated, you are Mr. Smith, no youre not. Mr. Smith, I like your voice. Im too easy, I know your voice. I know youre not Mr. Smith. Whats your name? I like to know names. Whats your name? Trooper Iman? All right, Trooper Iman, in why they put me in the car so tight, and I cant move, Im uncomfortable. No, Im hurting, you violating my rights and hurting me. Youre hurting me right now. I did nothing wrong. I hit nobody. I broke my law. I did nothing wrong, and youre violating my rights. You dont have to know whats going on. Im telling you, theyre violating my rights. They never investigated the scene. Yeah, we can go through the shit I ask for a lawyer, nobody got me a lawyer were gonna go through this shit. Take me along the road and just shoot me in the fucking head, get it over with, Im good with that, just dump me on the side of the road motherfuckers. Trust you motherfuckers, I dont like cops. All you did was hurt me, look what youre doing to me. Im in a fucking car in the front seat, the seatbelt on the tightest shit because the cop did it on purpose with with fucking ankle cuffs on me for no reason, I broke no laws somebody hit me. What the fuck? Put me in a cell by myself. Cause Ill fuck somebody up. Dont put me in a cell with somebody else. I dont fuck with people I dont like people dont put me in a cell with somebody Im a tell you that right now I dont fuck with people, they say something to me Im a fuck them up. Put me in a cell with somebody, bro, Im asking you for leniency. Do you think I can review because its a spiritual thing, Mr, whats your name, Mr. Mills, because youre a Mormon, its not a spiritual thing I just see you, I dont give a fuck what you believe truth be told, believe in God, believe in whatever you want but if you aint doing the right thing, fuck you. I didnt hurt nobody. Im a keep it real. They hit me in the back, but you never investigated the scene. Yall done did wrong didnt investigate the scene, try asking for a lawyer never got a lawyer, try to lawyer the first fifteen (15) minutes, you know that youre violating my rights, in the first half an hour I was supposed to have a lawyer. All right, Mr. Mills, you can beat my ass if you want, if you dont like that, hit me, go ahead, do you wanna, right? We aint going to the Sheriffs Department. Where we going Mr. Mills? I explained we were going to Carroll Hospital Center, and Dietz Jr. stated, Okay, Im just asking questions. I just wanted to know. I know this area, so Im asking. I dont know if Im about to be killed, you understand me? At least I know its about to happen, makes me feel good. Ready all my fucking. What does it feel to kill somebody because you had no choice, you dont know Mr. Mills, you dont know. How does it hurt, when somebody hurt you and you dont wanna hurt them, how do you feel Mr. Mills? How do you live with that? I didnt wanna hurt nobody but they hurt me. How do you live with that Mr. Mills, happen all the time, officer in the back, how do you move on? Im a soldier officer, how do you move on? How do you move on, officer? I killed many people, how do you move on? Can you feel it, it hurts. Going on. Do you like this or not? Clean driving, how about your parents? I could tell I was a profiler for the FBI, they paid me, Im really good at this shit. I watch yall, and I just pick you apart just to fuck with you. Too easy, I learned this shit when I was a kid, never had a mom or dad, fuck em. Mom and dad too busy, fuck em. Do you know what is missing, Mr. Mills, no love. It hurts, it hurts really bad. Ive protected so many people in my life, gave my life one time, tried to kill me, do you know what he did? Got a knife and tried to stab me, I looked in his eyes, turn the fuck around, little bitch. What does that say? Tried to fuck with a man, and you stabbing me. Once at Carroll Hospital Center, I went to assist Dietz Jr. out of the vehicle, and he mumbled incoherently, then stated, If I see Mr. Smith, I want to fuck his ass up, just on purpose, just because, put these handcuffs on tight. Im going to fuck Mr. Smith up, tell him. Fuck Mr. Smith up. Mr. Smith, on the fuck you up bitch put these handcuffs on me tight, and I ask for a lawyer, fuck you. While at the Carroll Hospital Center, I deactivated my body-worn camera in accordance with Maryland State Police Administration Directive 20.02(C)(9)(b). Dietz Jr. was screened for mental health illness by Dr. Loper. Dr. Loper refused to admit Dietz Jr. to the hospital for the suicidal statements he made due to the statements being a result of inebriation. Dietz Jr. was issued the following citations: CITATIONS: TA 21-304(c) Driving Motor Vehicle Off Roadway While Passing Vehicle TA 21-309(b) Driver Changing Lanes When Unsafe TA 21-801(b) Failure To Control Speed On Highway To Avoid Collision TA 21-901.1(a) Reckless Driving Vehicle In Wanton And Willful Disregard For Safety of Persons And Property TA 21-901.1(b) Negligent Driving Vehicle In Careless And Imprudent Manner Endangering Property, Life, And Person TA 21-902(a)(1)(i) Driving Vehicle While Under The Influence Of Alcohol TA 21-902(b)(1)(i) Driving Vehicle While Impaired By Alcohol The defendant was issued copies of the following documents: Citations (listed above) DR-15 Advice of Rights DR-15A Officers Certification and Order of Suspension All documents were forwarded to the Carroll County States Attorneys Office. Both involved vehicles in the collision were towed by Rockdale Towing. All events occurred in Carroll County, Maryland. CASE CLOSED BY ARREST.
